description: This file defines the GoalsScreen widget for a Flutter mobile app. It manages displaying a list of financial goals, adding new goals, and updating progress on existing goals. It includes UI components like a scaffold, list view, dialogs, and a form, as well as logic for fetching and updating goal data via a GoalProvider.

classes.name: GoalsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of goals, allows adding new goals, and updating progress on existing goals.

classes.name: _GoalsScreenState
classes.description: State class for GoalsScreen, handling initialization, user interactions, and UI building.

classes.name: _GoalForm
classes.description: A StatefulWidget presenting a form inside a modal to create a new goal.

classes.name: _GoalFormState
classes.description: State class for _GoalForm, managing form inputs, date picker, and submission logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, fetching goals after the widget is built.

methods.name: _openAddForm
methods.description: Displays a bottom sheet modal with the goal creation form.

methods.name: _quickAddProgress
methods.description: Shows a dialog to quickly add progress to a specific goal.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the goals screen, including the goal list and UI controls.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens a date picker to select a target date for a goal.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission to create a new goal.
